channel.title: English 8 helps plz i'm like failling :(
channel.description:
hi could someone plz gave me some study tip/guides on how to pass english grade 8? also could someone plz post some free study links for grade 8 subjects thx.
edit: i need some tips/ guides/links on: -how to write long effective senctence essays. -how to write effective novle book report letters. -what are the basic grammers that grade 8 students should know etc. -how to improve my vocabulaires. -how to write poems + types of poems.

item.description:

CToaN:

This is the structure of a basic 5 Paragraph essay, which you will most likely learn about in 9th grade English.

Aww! You learned that in 9th grade? I learned it in 7th…lucky…
